descr.p: An action class that uses a mole to build its response.
This combines the benefits of a mole, executable dynamic scripts, with those of an action, making use of regular expression patterns in the selector rather than simple file extensions.

element.name: TMoleAction.Respond
element.descr: TMoleAction descendants should not override this method. They should only set the Mole property to the mole their descendant will execute.

element.name: TMoleAction.Mole
element.short: The mole that handles this action
element.descr: This is the path to the mole that is executed when this action class is called. It doesn't need to have an extension registered in MoleExtensions, but AllowMole must be enabled.
